ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit

Class Macro

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.ui.textedit.Macro
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionRecorder

    public class Macro
extends Object
implements ActionRecorder
    A macro stores a sequence of editing actions for later playback.
    Since:
    2.1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Macro()
      Creates a new, empty macro.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void append(Macro sourceMacro)
      Appends the actions of an existing macro to the end of this macro.
      void play(JSourceCodeEditor editor)
      Plays the recorded macro actions back into the specified editor.
      void recordAction(InputHandler handler, ActionListener listener, String actionCommand)
      Appends a single editing action to the end of this macro.

      Returns the number of editing actions recorded in this macro.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Macro

        public Macro()
        Creates a new, empty macro.

    • Method Detail

      • append

        public void append(Macro sourceMacro)
        Appends the actions of an existing macro to the end of this macro.
        Parameters:
        sourceMacro - the macro to copy actions from

      • play

        public void play(JSourceCodeEditor editor)
        Plays the recorded macro actions back into the specified editor.
        Parameters:
        editor - the editor to execute the macro in

      • recordAction

        public void recordAction(InputHandler handler,
                         ActionListener listener,
                         String actionCommand)
        Appends a single editing action to the end of this macro.
        Specified by:
        recordAction in interface ActionRecorder
        Parameters:
        handler - the input handler through which the action would normally have been executed
        listener - the editing action to record
        actionCommand - the editing action's command parameter, or null

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of editing actions recorded in this macro.
        Returns:
        the number of recorded actions
